variants.Description in input context: A53T mutant form of R-synuclein associated with Parkinson's disease

Material used.Description: Human neuroblastoma cell line used for proteomic analysis

Readout description.Result Description: 71 differentially expressed proteins identified, including HSPA9, NDUFS1, DLAT, ATP5A1

Biological replicates.Description: Protein expression analysis performed across multiple biological samples

Technical replicates.Description: Each protein spot validated with triplicate samples

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and t-tests used for comparison between groups

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of control

Material used.Description: Proteins extracted from SH-SY5Y cells for Western blot validation

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot confirmed reduced expression of HSPA9, NDUFS1, DLAT, ATP5A1 in A53T mutant cells

Technical replicates.Description: Each protein band validated with triplicate samples

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and t-tests used for comparison between groups

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of control
